channel.title: 2025-03-03s on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: DeepSolution: Boosting Complex Engineering Solution Design via Tree-based Exploration and Bi-point Thinking
item.description: DeepSolution enhances engineering design via tree exploration and bi-point thinking.

item.title: HAIC: Improving Human Action Understanding and Generation with Better Captions for Multi-modal Large Language Models
item.description: HAIC improves MLLMs’ action understanding with high-quality video captions & new benchmark, boosting performance and generation.

item.title: Sim-to-Real Reinforcement Learning for Vision-Based Dexterous Manipulation on Humanoids
item.description: Sim-to-real RL recipe achieves robust vision-based dexterous humanoid manipulation without human demos!

item.title: SoS1: O1 and R1-Like Reasoning LLMs are Sum-of-Square Solvers
item.description: SoS1: O1 and R1-Like Reasoning LLMs are Sum-of-Square Solvers.

item.title: Chain of Draft: Thinking Faster by Writing Less
item.description: CoD: LLMs think faster by writing less! A novel prompting strategy cuts costs and latency while maintaining reasoning accuracy.
